import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './RSVP.css' export class RSVP extends Component { getInfo () { var dict = { Email : this.email, FirstName : this.firstName, LastName : this.lastName, IsAttending : this.isAttending, NumGuests : this.numGuests } console.log(dict["Email"]) console.log(dict["FirstName"]) console.log(dict["LastName"]) console.log(dict["IsAttending"]) console.log(dict["NumGuests"]) return(dict) } submitRSVP = (event) =>{ console.log(this.getInfo) } render() { return (

RSVP

for the wedding of

Oleg & Makayla

____________________________________

Details

Saturday, March 14, 2020

5:00 PM


Ceremony & Reception

A Beautiful Church

1000 Church Rd. Lawrenceville, GA 30019

_____________________________________ this.email = event.target.value}/>
this.firstName = event.target.value}/>
this.lastName = event.target.value}/>
this.numGuests = event.target.value}/>
) } } export default RSVP
